projects.name: Cursor Boston Community Site
projects.description: The open-source community platform you're looking at right now. Built with Next.js, Firebase, and Tailwind CSS by the Cursor Boston community.

projects.name: Local AI Assistant
projects.description: A privacy-first AI assistant that runs entirely on your machine. Uses local LLMs with a clean React interface for chat, code generation, and document analysis.

projects.name: CodeFlow Analytics
projects.description: Track your coding habits, PR velocity, and team collaboration patterns. Integrates with GitHub and GitLab to surface actionable developer productivity insights.
